scripts.clean-android: cd android && rm -R .gradle && cd app && rm -R build
scripts.reset: rm -rf node_modules/ && npm cache clear && watchman watch-del-all && npm i
scripts.debug-build: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res/ && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug && cd app/src/main/res/ && rmdir /S /Q raw && rmdir /S /Q drawable-mdpi
scripts.release-build: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/build/intermediates/res/merged/release/ && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease && cd..
